text: Antonio Berber Martínez (born 13 November 1977) is a Mexican politician from the National Action Party. From 2006 to 2009 he served as Deputy of the LX Legislature of the Mexican Congress representing Michoacán. ==References== Category:1977 births Category:Living people Category:Politicians from Michoacán Category:Members of the Chamber of Deputies (Mexico) Category:National Action Party (Mexico) politicians Category:21st-century Mexican politicians
title: Antonio Berber Martínez
